mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USERNAME, REALNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDRESS_1, ADDRESS_2, PHONE, SSN ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{realname}, #{password}, #{email}, #{address1}, C##SAINTRA.CRYPTO.ENCRYPT_AES(#{address2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), C##SAINTRA.CRYPTO.ENCRYPT_AES(#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), C##SAINTRA.CRYPTO.ENCRYPT_AES(#{ssn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
mapper.sql: SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, REALNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, ROLE, SSN, ADDRESS_1 address1, ADDRESS_2 address2, JOB_ID jobId, DEPT_ID deptId, TEAM_ID teamId, IS_ACTIVE isActive FROM TB_USER

SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, REALNAME, EMAIL, C##SAINTRA.CRYPTO.DECRYPT_AES(PHONE) AS phone, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, ROLE, C##SAINTRA.CRYPTO.DECRYPT_AES(SSN) AS ssn, ADDRESS_1 address1, C##SAINTRA.CRYPTO.DECRYPT_AES(ADDRESS_2) AS address2, JOB_ID jobId, DEPT_ID deptId, TEAM_ID teamId, IS_ACTIVE isActive FROM TB_USER
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, REALNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, ROLE, SSN, ADDRESS_1 address1, ADDRESS_2 address2, JOB_ID jobId, DEPT_ID deptId, TEAM_ID teamId, IS_ACTIVE isActive FROM TB_USER WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND IS_ACTIVE = 'N'
WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT U.ID, U.USERNAME, U.PASSWORD, U.REALNAME, U.EMAIL, CRYPTO.DECRYPT_AES(U.PHONE) AS phone, U.ENROLL_DATE enrollDate, U.ROLE, CRYPTO.DECRYPT_AES(U.SSN) AS ssn, U.ADDRESS_1 address1, CRYPTO.DECRYPT_AES(U.ADDRESS_2) AS address2, U.JOB_ID jobId, J.JOB_NAME jobName, U.DEPT_ID deptId, D.DEPT_NAME deptName, U.TEAM_ID teamId, T.TEAM_NAME teamName, U.IS_ACTIVE isActive FROM TB_USER U LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(U.DEPT_ID = D.ID) LEFT JOIN TB_JOB J ON(U.JOB_ID = J.ID) LEFT JOIN TB_TEAM T ON(U.TEAM_ID = T.ID)
WHERE U.REALNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR T.TEAM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY ID DESC OFFSET #{currentPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USER U LEFT JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(U.DEPT_ID = D.ID) LEFT JOIN TB_JOB J ON(U.JOB_ID = J.ID) LEFT JOIN TB_TEAM T ON(U.TEAM_ID = T.ID)
WHERE U.REALNAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR T.TEAM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR J.JOB_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

UPDATE TB_USER SET IS_ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE ID = #{id}
